title: Churn rate of Spotify worldwide 2017 to 2018
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Churn rate, containing a total of 2 data points.
In general Churn rate has rose over the Year.
Churn rate is slightly increasing from 2017 to 2018.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2017 and 2018.
Maximum Churn rate, about 19.8 was reported at Year 2018
The lowest Churn rate, of value 18.1 was reported at Year 2017
